profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional full-stack development and business consulting, with no specific mention of AI, machine learning models, or generative AI technologies. While it involves software development and data analysis, it lacks the core elements required for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.

phrases: work on building Software Solutions to enable our internal and external clients
work on complex transformation projects, where the impact of new laws and regulations (e.g. CSRD, ESEF), reporting requirements and changes in the IT landscape play a crucial role
make optimal use of technology during these complex processes (e.g. during an IPO, merger or acquisition), stimulate innovation and help them transform to a future-proof and agile business model
gather requirements
As you work on Projects / Products you are expected to learn the Business / Accounting / Finance concepts expected of the Project / Product
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand client needs, business processes, regulatory environments, and strategic goals to deliver relevant software solutions.

phrases: building Software Solutions
Software Developers
Full Stack Developer
define the architecture
manage the development and deployment of Software solutions
Working on Internal tool development and external client projects
Working as part of Agile development teams
Managing the development and deployment of software solutions
Building web applications
using Python (FastAPI, Django), Javascript (React) and SQL and NoSQL
Learning and using git for version control
Completing the documentation tasks
job_tasks.justification: The core of the role involves developing, architecting, deploying, and managing software applications, including web applications, using various programming languages and tools.

phrases: work on Data Analysis projects using Python (FastAPI, Django), Javascript (React) and SQL and NoSQL
job_tasks.justification: While not a primary focus, the mention of 'Data Analysis projects' and the use of SQL/NoSQL databases suggests some involvement in data handling and preparation.

phrases: stimulate innovation
transform to a future-proof and agile business model
take full responsibility for the quality and success of one's work
job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'stimulate innovation' and the implied responsibility for project success point towards an ownership and proactive approach.

phrases: continuously invest globally in the development of our team members, our skills and the innovative tools
Learning and using git for version control
As you work on Projects / Products you are expected to learn the Business / Accounting / Finance concepts
motivated to complete the onboarding training of the team (Technical & Non-Technical) on time
job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes continuous learning, adapting to new tools and business concepts, and completing training, highlighting the need for adaptability.

phrases: work with in multidisciplinary teams (including deals & technical accounting experts, ERP & technology specialists, software developers and data analysts)
work closely with our clients
Coaching colleagues in the areas of personal growth and development of various consulting skills
job_tasks.justification: The role requires working in diverse teams, collaborating with clients, and coaching colleagues, all of which are communication and collaboration-intensive activities.
